original_text: You must also measure 1,000 metres outside the town on each side, the east side, the south side, the west side and the north side. So the town will be in the centre. Those fields of grass will belong to them for each of their towns.
korean_text: 성을 중앙에 두고 성 밖 동쪽으로 이천 규빗, 남쪽으로 이천 규빗, 서쪽으로 이천 규빗, 북쪽으로 이천 규빗을 측량할지니 이는 그들의 성읍의 들이며

sentences.original_text: outside the town on each side
the east side, the south side
the west side and the north side
So the town will be in the centre
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 도시는 중앙에 있게 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: Those fields of grass will belong to them
